mapper.update:
update wcs_job_execution_summary
job_interval = #{jobInterval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_count = #{totalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
error_count = #{errorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_elapsed_time = #{totalElapsedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
min_elapsed_time = #{minElapsedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_elapsed_time = #{maxElapsedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_defined1 = #{userDefined1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined2 = #{userDefined2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined3 = #{userDefined3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined4 = #{userDefined4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined5 = #{userDefined5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and summary_hour = #{summaryHour,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update wcs_job_execution_summary set job_interval = #{jobInterval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_count = #{totalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, error_count = #{errorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_elapsed_time = #{totalElapsedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, min_elapsed_time = #{minElapsedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_elapsed_time = #{maxElapsedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_defined1 = #{userDefined1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined2 = #{userDefined2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined3 = #{userDefined3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined4 = #{userDefined4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined5 = #{userDefined5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and summary_hour = #{summaryHour,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update wcs_job_execution_summary
total_count = total_count + 1,
error_count = error_count + 1,
total_elapsed_time = total_elapsed_time + #{totalElapsedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
min_elapsed_time = #{minElapsedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_elapsed_time = #{maxElapsedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_defined1 = #{userDefined1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined2 = #{userDefined2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined3 = #{userDefined3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined4 = #{userDefined4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined5 = #{userDefined5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and summary_hour = #{summaryHour,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql:
where 1=1
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.job_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.jobName},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.summary_hour LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.summaryHour},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.job_interval LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.jobInterval},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.total_count LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.totalCount},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.error_count LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.errorCount},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.total_elapsed_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.totalElapsedTime},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.min_elapsed_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.minElapsedTime},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.max_elapsed_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.maxElapsedTime},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.user_defined1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined1},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.user_defined2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined2},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.user_defined3 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined3},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.user_defined4 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined4},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.user_defined5 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined5},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.gmt_create LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.gmtCreate},'%')
and wcs_job_execution_summary_.gmt_modified LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.gmtModified},'%')
